name: Tetris++
description:
Tetris++ is a small Tetris game which features 2 game modes: classic and anti gravity. The game also features a dark and white theme which can be selected at any time. You can also pause a running game or just start a new round. Game modes can only be selected after you lost the running round.

Tetris++ is Windows only and needs .Net Framework 4.6.1 or newer in order to run.

Tetris++ is a game made by Jan "GamesTrap" Schürkamp and Jason "Ethoras" Farah.
